operations with parea collections
[production area (parea)]


Functions

bool surfit::pareas_delall ()
 removes all production areas from flow_pareas collection
bool surfit::pareas_del (int pos)
 removes production area from flow_pareas collection at 'pos' position
bool surfit::pareas_read (const char *filename, const char *pareaname, REAL value, int columns, int col1, int col2, const char *delimiter, int grow_by)
 reads production area from formatted text file and adds it to flow_pareas collection
bool surfit::pareas_load (const char *filename, const char *pareaname)
 reads production area from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to flow_pareas collection
parea * surfit::pareas_at (int pos)
 returns production area at 'pos' position in flow_pareas collection
parea * surfit::pareas_first ()
 returns first production area in flow_pareas collection
parea * surfit::pareas_last ()
 returns last produciton area in flow_pareas collection
int surfit::pareas_size ()
 returns amount of elements in flow_pareas collection
int surfit::pareas_info ()
 prints information about all production areas in surfit_areas collection
